  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws IOException
      Initializes all databases by loading data from their respective sources.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during data loading.

    • save

      public void save() throws IOException
      Saves all database data to their respective storage sources.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during data saving.
